content: sweater is worked from top down in one piece to end of yoke yoke and v-neck shaping worked in row body and sleeves worked in rnds turn at end of each round bottom sleeve and v-neck ribbings are made after and sewn in place as work progresses need 4 stitch markers and yarn needle to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished chest xs/s 38 96 5 cm m 42 106 5 cm l 46 117 cm xl 51 129 5 cm 2/3xl 59 150 cm 4/5xl 67 170 cm
